sentences.en: At room temperature, thermal excitation can produce an unwanted current.
sentences.cn: 在温室下, 热激发可能产生所不需要的电流.

sentences.en: Both ionization and excitation lead to eletronic transitions that may be the emission of light.
sentences.cn: 电离和激发都将导致可能伴随有光发射的电子跃迁.

sentences.en: Clip - gage excitation was supplied by a commercially available power supply ( signal conditioner ).
sentences.cn: 回形引伸计的激励电压由商售的通用电源装置 ( 信号调制器 ) 来提供.

sentences.en: Consequently, asynchronous excitation and fibrillation of muscle fibers are observed.
sentences.cn: 所以就出现非同步的肌纤维兴奋和纤颤.
他的眼睛闪烁激动的目光.

sentences.en: In dumb rabies there is a very short excitation phase.
sentences.cn: 在狂犬病潜伏期,有一非常短的兴奋期.

sentences.en: It is possible to describe the excitation spectra in terms of elementary modes of excitation.
sentences.cn: 可以借助于基本激发模式来描述激发谱.

sentences.en: Objective Explore the mechanism of intermittent pre - excitation syndrome ( IPS ).
sentences.cn: 探讨间歇性预激 综合征 的形成机制.

sentences.en: Perhaps his nerve is naturally too dull to admit of any excitation.
sentences.cn: 大概他的神经天生就很迟钝以至不容有任何刺激的余地.

sentences.en: The compensator is added in excitation system of the generator.
sentences.cn: 补偿器的输出信号作用在本地发电机励磁系统.

sentences.en: The different excitation sources are pulsed to give intermittment radiation.
sentences.cn: 各种激发源形成脉动,以产生间歇的辐射.

sentences.en: The dynamic excitation device is used for generating the dynamic excitation signals.
sentences.cn: 产生动态激励信号的设备是动态激励装置.

sentences.en: The operation of scintallator counters, on the other hand, depends upon excitation.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 闪烁计数器是依靠激发过程工作的.

sentences.en: The paper presents a novel nonlinear adaptive optimal excitation controller.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种非线性自适应最优励磁控制器.

sentences.en: There are several types of excitation to which structures may be subjected.
sentences.cn: 结构可能受到的激励有几种类型.

words.tran_cn: 易激动的；易兴奋的；易怒的
令人兴奋的；使人激动的

兴奋；刺激；令人兴奋的事物
[物][力]激发，刺激；[电子]激励；激动

励磁电压；激励电压；激发电压

trans.tran_cn: <物>（原子获得高能量的）激发（过程），激动，（由刺激引起的器官、组织等的）应激反应，<电>励磁
trans.tran_en: the act or process of exciting or state of being excited
